title: TilesFormatter JSON
description: JSON object that defines tiles in 'Tiles' layout.

height.description: Height of the tile in pixels.

width.description: Width of the tile in pixels. Can go from height /2 to 3x height.

hideSelection.description: If true, then selection UX in 'Tiles' layout will be disabled. Ignored if there is no formatter defined.

formatter.description: JSON object that defines formatting of a tile.

headerFormatter.description: JSON object that defines formatting for the group headers
